desc: Web scraping for Umrah and Hajj Travel agenciesStage one Objective:We need to collect the contact information of all available travel agencies that provide Umrah and Hajj Packages/ programs in 5 stars hotels. Those agencies that don't offer 5 stars hotel Umrah shall not be listed.Output formatYour work shall be collected in excel sheets with the following columns: 1. Contact person name 2. Organization name3. Country4. City5. Address6. Phone (Landline) including the country and city code7. Mobile including the country code.8. Website9. Facebook10. Twitter11. Email12. Remarks (please mention from where have you got this information)Notes: If any information is not available please leave it blank. All phone numbers, mobile numbers and emails should be recorded. Any necessary additional information that you find useful shall be recorded in and additional column. Items in red are mandatory.Frist StageYou shall start by your home country. Other stages shall be arranged after finishing your first stage.Where to find the needed information:You can search by google for Umrah travel agencies, for directories that list Umrah and hajj travel agents, for the Saudi embassy website in your country as they always list the Hajj and Umrah approved Travel agencies, searching by different languages specially those spoken in your country and searching on social media, etc.Stage 2 ObjectiveMarketing and sales

desc: Please read ALL the project description before applying.We have a new shop that is visible at : [url removed, login to view]Targeting mainly the Swiss and French market with various items.We need a person that can preferably understand French language and promote our sales.- Marketing on Facebook with ad preparation- Marketing on Social Media in General- Sales management and follow upAs we had multiple poor experiences with unqualified marketers in the past, we would like to underline the fact that marketing is done to be profitable from day one, not after a few months.Consequently the salary basis need to be based strictly on the results.Our Facebook/Google budget is $200 per month paid directly to Facebook or Google.Our marketer budget for the selected freelancer is :$100 for the first month if the sales are reaching Sfr 800 (minimum expected during 1st month)$200 per month if the sales are reaching Sfr 1'600 per month (minium expected)$300 per month if the sales are reaching Sfr 2'600 per month$400 per month if the sales are reaching Sfr 3'600 per month$500 per month if the sales are reaching Sfr 4'600 per monthPossibility of additional bonus if the freelancer is able to maintain sales level over the long run.Only bids at $100 will be accepted all others discarded to make sure you read the above information until the end.Please don't bid if you are not able to do it or with other amounts than the one specified above.We are looking for a long term relationship for our provider to have the ability to create a regular income based on the above figures.There will be only 2 milestones :1/ Sfr 800 of sales and2/ Sfr 1'600 of sales.All sales results are provided directly by [url removed, login to view]Feel free to ask any question.
title: New online store need a promotion manager - payment based on sales results

desc: I have a new website ( 3 months old) in the Tourism industry; very niche market! I hired the services of a reputable Indian seo company during these 3 months, but I didn't see any results! I decided to stop using that company , and look for a seo freelancer who can help us rank our website on google for certain keywords!
